snippet.title: Flashback Official Trailer (HD)
snippet.description:
The sci-fi classic game reimagined by the original core team ! Join us on Facebook http://FB.com/GameNewsOfficial & http://twitter.com/gamenewstrailer. The first and official Flashback trailer is here ! Do you remember ? Conrad B Hart is back !

Flashback Official Trailer (HD). Release date for Flashback HD : 2013 for PS3 (PSN) and Xbox 360 (XBLA). Subscribe now to get the latest game trailer, gameplay teaser & cinematic video, videogame walkthrough and ingame videos with Game News Official (GameNews) ! Flashback 2013.
